Row.Text: Unique Building
Academy
+4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Has 3 Codex slots. Antiquity Science Building.
Has 3 Codex slots. Antiquity Science Building.
Altar
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Receives additional benefits from Pantheons. Antiquity Happiness Building. Can be purchased in Towns.
Receives additional benefits from Pantheons. Antiquity Happiness Building. Can be purchased in Towns.
Amphitheater
+4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Antiquity Culture Building. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Wonders.
Antiquity Culture Building. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Wonders.
Ancient Bridge

+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River. Pillaged by any Flood. Can be purchased in Towns.

Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River. Pillaged by any Flood. Can be purchased in Towns.
Ancient Walls

Adds 100 HP to the District and +15 Combat Strength to Units defending in the tile. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Antiquity Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another Fortified District. Can be purchased in Towns only on the Town Center.

Adds 100 HP to the District and +15 Combat Strength to Units defending in the tile. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Antiquity Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another Fortified District. Can be purchased in Towns only on the Town Center.
Arena
+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Antiquity Happiness Building. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters.
Antiquity Happiness Building. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters.
Barracks

+2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Antiquity Military Building. Land Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this Building's location. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Land Units.
Antiquity Military Building. Land Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this Building's location. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Land Units.
Bath
+4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. Antiquity Food Building. +10% Growth Rate. Must be placed on a River.
Antiquity Food Building. +10% Growth Rate. Must be placed on a River.
Blacksmith
+3[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Antiquity Production Building. +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Quarters.
Antiquity Production Building. +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Quarters.
Brickyard
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Clay Pits, Mines, and Quarries. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Clay Pits, Mines, and Quarries. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
Fishing Quay

+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Fishing Boats. Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on Coast, a Lake tile, or a Navigable River.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Fishing Boats. Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on Coast, a Lake tile, or a Navigable River.
Garden
+3[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Antiquity Food and Happiness Building.
Antiquity Food and Happiness Building.
Granary
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations. Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations. Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
Library
+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Has 2 Codex slots. Antiquity Science Building.
Has 2 Codex slots. Antiquity Science Building.
Lighthouse
+3[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 2. Antiquity Gold Building. Must be placed on Coast.
Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 2. Antiquity Gold Building. Must be placed on a Coast tile.
Market
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Increases number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1. Antiquity Gold Building.
Increases number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1. Antiquity Gold Building.
Monument
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +1[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Antiquity Culture and Diplomacy Building.
Antiquity Culture and Diplomacy Building.
Saw Pit
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Camps and Woodcutters. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Camps and Woodcutters. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
Villa
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Antiquity Happiness and Diplomacy Building. Can be purchased in Towns during the Revolt Crisis.
Antiquity Happiness and Diplomacy Building.
Mastaba
+3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Desert Terrain and Wonders. Egyptian Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Egyptian Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Mortuary Temple
+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Navigable Rivers and Wonders. Egyptian Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Egyptian Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Odeon
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. Greek Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Greek Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Parthenon
+4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence if placed on Rough Terrain. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture adjacency for Wonders. Greek Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
+2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence if placed on Rough Terrain. Greek Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Dharamshala
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. Mauryan Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Mauryan Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Vihara
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Mountains and Wonders. Mauryan Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Mauryan Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Jalaw
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. Mayan Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Mayan Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
K'uh Nah
+3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science if placed on Vegetation. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for Wonders. Mayan Unique Science Building. Ageless.
+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science if placed on Vegetation. Mayan Unique Science Building. Ageless.
Basilica
+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence Adjacency for Culture Buildings and Wonders. Roman Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Roman Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Temple of Jupiter
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Happiness Buildings and Wonders. Roman Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Roman Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Baray

Khmer Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain. One per Settlement. +3[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Floodplains in this Settlement. Improvements, Buildings, and Districts in this Settlement do not get pillaged by floods.

Khmer Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain. One per Settlement. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Floodplains in this Settlement. Improvements, Buildings, and Districts in this Settlement do not get pillaged by floods.
Great Wall

+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for adjacent Great Wall segments. Han Unique Improvement. Ageless. Counts as Fortification, +6 Combat Strength when defending. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Can only be built in a line and must be placed on an existing Improvement. Cannot branch or fork.

+6 Combat Strength for Units defending in the tile. Han Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Can only be built in a line and must be placed on an existing Improvement. Cannot branch or fork.
Hawilt

+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for adjacent Wonders and other Hawilti. Aksumite Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain.
Aksumite Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain.
Pairidaeza

+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Persian Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Pairidaeza.
Persian Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Pairidaeza.
Potkop

+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food for each adjacent Resource. Mississippian Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain.
Mississippian Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain.
Hillfort

+2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 sight, and +5 healing per turn to Military Units on this tile. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Counts as Fortification, +6 Combat Strength when defending. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Rough Terrain.

+1 sight, and +5 healing per turn to Military Units on this tile. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Counts as Fortification, +6 Combat Strength when defending. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Rough Terrain.
Megalith

+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food for every adjacent Rural tile. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain.
City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Flat Terrain.
Emporium

+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in Cities if they have at least one Resource assigned to them. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Emporium.

+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in Cities if they have at least one Resource assigned to them. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Emporium.
Step Pyramid

+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for every adjacent River tile. City-State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on tiles with a natural Happiness yield.

City-State Unique Improvement. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for every adjacent River tile. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on tiles with a natural Happiness yield.
Acropolis
Greek Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Odeon and Parthenon in the same District. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on the Parthenon for each City-State you are Suzerain of.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on the Parthenon for each City-State you are Suzerain of.
Forum
Roman Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Basilica and Temple of Jupiter in the same District. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Unique Tradition in the Government.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Unique Tradition in the Government.
Matha
Mauryan Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Dharamshala and Vihara in the same District. +10%[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement.
+10%[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement.
Necropolis

Egyptian Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Mastaba and Mortuary Temple in the same District. Grants 100[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold (on Standard Speed) when any Wonder is completed in this Settlement.
Grants 100[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold (on Standard Speed) when any Wonder is completed in this Settlement.
Uwaybil K'uh

Maya Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Jalaw and K'uh Nah in the same District. Every time you research a Technology, this Settlement gains[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to 5% of its cost.
Every time you research a Technology, this Settlement gains[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to 5% of its cost.
Angkor Wat
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1 Specialist Limit in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a River.
+1 Specialist Limit in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a River.
Colosseum
+3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Colossus
+3[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +3 Resource Capacity in this Settlement. +1 Economic Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land.
+3 Resource Capacity in this Settlement. +1 Economic Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land.
Dur-Sharrukin
Acts as a Fortified District that must be conquered. +3 Combat Strength to Fortified Districts in all Settlements. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Acts as a Fortified District that must be conquered. +3 Combat Strength to Fortified Districts in all Settlements. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
+{1_Amount} Dur-Sharrukin
Emile Bell
Gain a unique Diplomatic Endeavor called Ginseng Agreement that grants Food to both Leaders' Capitals. +1 Diplomatic Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Rough Terrain.
Gain a unique Diplomatic Endeavor called Ginseng Agreement that grants Food to both Leaders' Capitals. +1 Diplomatic Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Rough Terrain.
Gate of All Nations
+2 Support on all wars. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
+2 Support on all wars. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Great Stele
Gain 200[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold when you construct a Wonder in this Settlement, including this one. Ageless. Must be placed on Flat Terrain.
Gain 200[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold when you construct a Wonder in this Settlement, including this one. Ageless. Must be placed on Flat Terrain.
Ha'amonga 'a Maui

+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Fishing Boats in this Settlement. +1 Cultural Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Grassland or Tropical and adjacent to Coast.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Fishing Boats in this Settlement. +1 Cultural Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Grassland or Tropical and adjacent to Coast.
Hanging Gardens
+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms in this Settlement. +10% Growth Rate in all Cities. +1 Expansionist Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a River.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms in this Settlement. +10% Growth Rate in all Cities. +1 Expansionist Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a River.
Mausoleum of Theodoric
+3[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +100% yields and HP from pillaging. +1 Militaristic Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
+100% yields and HP from pillaging. +1 Militaristic Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
Monks Mound
+3[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +4 Resource Capacity in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a River.
+4 Resource Capacity in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a River.
Mundo Perdido
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Tropical Terrain in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Tropical.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Tropical Terrain in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Tropical.
Nalanda
+3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Gain 1 Codex. Has 2 Codex slots. +1 Scientific Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Plains.
Gain 1 Codex. Has 2 Codex slots. +1 Scientific Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed on Plains.
Oracle
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. When gaining rewards from a Narrative Event, gain an additional 10[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age. Ageless. Must be placed on Rough Terrain.
When gaining rewards from a Narrative Event, gain an additional 10[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age. Ageless. Must be placed on Rough Terrain.
Petra
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Desert Terrain in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Desert.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Desert Terrain in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Desert.
Pyramid Of The Sun
+3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Flat Terrain adjacent to a District.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Flat Terrain adjacent to a District.
Pyramids
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Minor and Navigable River tiles in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Desert and adjacent to a Navigable River.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Minor and Navigable River tiles in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Desert and adjacent to a Navigable River.
Sanchi Stupa
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every 5 excess[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Plains.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every 5 excess[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed on Plains.
Terracotta Army
+2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Grants a free Army Commander when built. +25% Army experience. Ageless. Must be placed on Grassland.
Grants a free Army Commander when built. +25% Army experience. Ageless. Must be placed on Grassland.
Weiyang Palace
+6[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Ageless. Must be placed on Grassland.
Ageless. Must be placed on Grassland.
